title: Little Caesars Pizza Data
text: lcpizza contains nutrition local pricing data core pizzas toppings available Little Caesars Canada.

title: Little Caesars Pizza Data
text: package can installed GitHub using: don’t {pak} /don’t want use {pak}, can also use:

title: Little Caesars Pizza Data
code: data(pizzas)  pizzas #> # A tibble: 27 × 18 #>    size   crust   flavour price calories total_fat sat_fat trans_fat cholesterol #>    <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>   <dbl>     <dbl>       <dbl> #>  1 medium regular Pepper…  7.99     1590        63      29       1.5         125 #>  2 medium regular Cheese   7.99     1400        46      22       0.5          85 #>  3 medium regular Ultima… 11.5      1750        74      33       1.5         150 #>  4 medium regular 3 Meat… 11.5      1980        98      41       1.5         205 #>  5 medium regular Canadi… 11.5      1820        84      36       1.5         175 #>  6 medium regular Hula H… 11.5      1590        49      23       0.5         125 #>  7 medium regular Veggie  12.5      1520        53      23       0.5          85 #>  8 medium regular BBQ Ch… 12.5      1550        48      23       0.5         130 #>  9 medium stuffed Cheese  12.5      1760        75      39       1.5         165 #> 10 medium stuffed Pepper… 12.5      1960        93      46       2.5         205 #> # ℹ 17 more rows #> # ℹ 9 more variables: sodium <dbl>, total_carb <dbl>, fibre <dbl>, sugar <dbl>, #> #   protein <dbl>, vit_a <dbl>, vit_c <dbl>, calcium <dbl>, iron <dbl>

title: Little Caesars Pizza Data

text: Nutritional information local pricing core pizzas available Little Caesars (Canada).

title: Pizza nutrition and pricing data — pizzas
Pizza nutrition and pricing data — pizzas
text: tibble 27 rows 18 columns: size size pizza. size NA means pizza comes one size. crust type crust used. flavour name pizza. price Local pricing Canadian Dollars. calories Total calories. total_fat Total fat, grams. sat_fat Saturated fat, grams. trans_fat Trans fat, grams. cholesterol Cholesterol, milligrams. sodium Sodium, milligrams. total_carb Total carbohydrate, grams. fibre Dietary fibre, grams. sugar Sugar, grams. protein Protein, grams. vit_a Vitamin , percentage recommended daily value. vit_c Vitamin C, percentage recommended daily value. calcium Calcium, percentage recommended daily value. iron Iron, percentage recommended daily value.

title: Pizza nutrition and pricing data — pizzas
Pizza nutrition and pricing data — pizzas
text: Local pricing obtained Ottawa, Canada (note: prices may vary within city).
